General.Name: Kuang Chi Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Kuang-Chi Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of new-generation metamaterial cutting-edge equipment products in China. The company operates through Metamaterials Business and Auto Parts Business segments. It offers aviation and marine structural products; smart wearable equipment; and auto parts, such as car seat slides, recliners, lifters, car seat functional parts, safety parts, and other key components. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Longsheng Auto Parts Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kuang-Chi Technologies Co., Ltd. in June 2017. Kuang-Chi Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Yangyang  Zhang
1.Title: CFO, Sec. to the Board & Non-Independent Director
